content: this pattern is a recipe to make a crescent shawl it can use any weight of yarn and can be as dense or full of drape as you d like i put it in as fingering weight but go wild when you re reading the pattern please note the reason that i ask you to have at least enough yarn for 4 row is that you have one increase row and a bind off to do those two things eat up a bunch of yarn so i wanted to make sure you don t run out of yarn before the end of your project thank you to my dh for getting me this lovely yarn and thank you to softsweater for taking the lovely photos http //softsweaterfibres blogspot ca/
